alert.note: Alert for Chisago; Isanti; Kanabec (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 10:41PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Kanabec, northwestern Chisago, north central Isanti and northwestern Polk Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1041 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brunswick, or 12 miles west of Pine City, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, nickel size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Grasston around 1050 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Rush City. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 152 and 163. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for east central Minnesota.
